function renderLine( line, pattern) for i=1, strlen(pattern) do local c = strsub( pattern, i, i) if c =="#" then set_stone( "st-greenbrown", i-1, line) elseif c == "o" then oxyd( i-1, line) elseif c == "*" then set_stone( "st-brownie", i-1, line) elseif c == "!" then abyss(i-1,line) elseif c == "~" then set_floor("fl-water",i-1,line) elseif c=="z" then set_actor("ac-blackball", i-.5,line+.5, {player=0}) set_item("it-trigger",i-1,line,{invisible=1,action="callback",target="funccreset"}) elseif c=="y" then set_actor("ac-whiteball", i-1,line+.5, {player=1}) elseif c == "g" then draw_stones("st-grate1",{i-1,line}, {1,1}, 1) elseif c=="+" then set_stone( "st-wood", i-1, line) elseif c=="=" then set_floor("fl-space",i-1,line) elseif c=="A" then doorh(i-1,line,{name="d1"}) elseif c=="B" then doorh(i-1,line,{name="d2"}) elseif c=="1" then set_floor("fl-leaves",i-1,line) set_item("it-trigger",i-1,line,{invisible=1,action="callback",target="funcc1"}) elseif c=="2" then set_floor("fl-wood",i-1,line) set_item("it-trigger",i-1,line,{invisible=1,action="callback",target="funcc2"}) elseif c=="3" then set_floor("fl-sand",i-1,line) set_item("it-trigger",i-1,line,{invisible=1,action="callback",target="funcc3"}) elseif c=="4" then set_floor("fl-bluegreen",i-1,line) set_item("it-trigger",i-1,line,{invisible=1,action="callback",target="funcc4"}) elseif c=="5" then set_floor("fl-metal",i-1,line) set_item("it-trigger",i-1,line,{invisible=1,action="callback",target="funcc5"}) elseif c=="6" then set_floor("fl-tigris",i-1,line) set_item("it-trigger",i-1,line,{invisible=1,action="callback",target="funcc6"}) elseif c=="7" then set_floor("fl-sahara",i-1,line) set_item("it-trigger",i-1,line,{invisible=1,action="callback",target="funcc7"}) elseif c=="8" then set_floor("fl-red",i-1,line) set_item("it-trigger",i-1,line,{invisible=1,action="callback",target="funcc8"}) elseif c=="0" then set_item("it-trigger",i-1,line,{invisible=1,action="callback",target="funccreset"}) end end end

ffc=0 function funccreset() c1=0 c2=0 c3=0 c4=0 c5=0 c6=0 c7=0 c8=0 if ffc==1 then ffc=0 enigma.SendMessage(d1,"open",nil) enigma.SendMessage(d2,"open",nil) end end
